headline: KLA (NasdaqGS:KLAC) Secures New US$1.5 Billion Credit Agreement With Sustainability Links
summary: KLA (NasdaqGS:KLAC) made headlines recently by entering into a new $1.5 billion unsecured revolving credit facility, a significant development that underscores its commitment to liquidity and potentially bolsters investor confidence. Over the last quarter, KLA's share price surged 31%, markedly ahead of the broader market's 13% gain over the past twelve months. This increase may have been supported by strong Q3 earnings and the announcement of a dividend hike, aligning with broader market...

headline: AMAT Rides on AI Demand: Will Logic and DRAM Strength Last?
summary: Applied Materials gains from booming AI demand, with traction across its foundry, logic and DRAM offerings.
